abstract.p: John Hansen letter on July 16 issue on race in America holds media have been going about trying to create racism-free society in wrong way0

block.p: Unlike most coverage, your issue wasn't mere antiracism cant. I'm all for a racism-free society, but the way the media have been going about it is all wrong. Instead of shouting out slogans, we should express our true feelings regarding race without holding back. If someone feels anger toward a certain race or religion, we ought to let him voice it and then try to educate him, not yell at and scold him for having those feelings.
